channel.title: Please Wait
channel.description: we'll im coding a winterloves server from scratch and i added the levelup void, when to you click "click here to continue" it goes into "Please Wait..." and it will never close anyone know how to make it close? Thanx

item.title: Please Wait
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

ugh im sorry but it still doesn’t work =( i want to have these sendframes working to have on my server as a nice touch

Read full topic

item.title: Please Wait

uhm… for the click here… you see all those fancy //?just delete those on the codes you want.

item.title: Please Wait
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Yes case 185:

Put break;

That will close it.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Wait

@Waffles1 wrote:

Make a case for clicking that interface, and just make it something like
case blah:
{
closeInterface();
}
break;

item.title: Please Wait
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

[code]public void levelup(int skill)
{
switch(skill)
{
case 0: // Attack levelup
// sendFrame164(6247);
// sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!”, 6248);
// sendFrame126(“Your attack level is now “+playerLevel[0]+” .”, 6249);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 1: // Strength
//sendFrame164(6206);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!”, 6207);
//sendFrame126(“Your strength level is now “+playerLevel[2]+” .”, 6208);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 2: // Defence
//sendFrame164(6253);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!”, 6254);
//sendFrame126(“Your defence level is now “+playerLevel[1]+” .”, 6255);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 3: //Hitpoints
//sendFrame164(6216);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level!”, 6217);
//sendFrame126(“Your hitpoints level is now “+playerLevel[3]+” .”, 6218);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 4: //Ranging
//sendFrame164(4443);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a ranged level!”, 4444);
//sendFrame126(“Your ranged level is now “+playerLevel[4]+” .”, 4445);

break;
case 5: // Prayer
//sendFrame164(6242);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a prayer level!”, 6243);
//sendFrame126(“Your prayer level is now “+playerLevel[5]+” .”, 6244);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a prayer level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 6: // Magic
//sendFrame164(6211);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a magic level!”, 6212);
//sendFrame126(“Your magic level is now “+playerLevel[6]+” .”, 6213);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a magic level.”);

break;
case 7: //Cooking
// sendFrame164(6226);

case 8: //Woodcutting

sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a woodcutting level.”);

break;
case 9: //Fletching
//sendFrame164(6231);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a fletching level!”, 6232);
//sendFrame126(“Your fletching level is now “+playerLevel[9]+” .”, 6233);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a fletching level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 10: //fishing
//sendFrame164(6258);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a fishing level!”, 6259);
//sendFrame126(“Your fishing level is now “+playerLevel[10]+” .”, 6260);

//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 11: //firemaking

//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a fire making level!”, 4283);

case 12: //crafting

case 13: //Smithing
